content: BTCAuction End Time: Bitcoin Block number: 813,665Sniping:  sniping. 1 Bitcoin block standard sniping rule... https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5277761.0Bid Format:  BTCStarting Bid: 0.00000001 BTC = 1 satsLot 1: WINNER Satoshi Nakamoto  with 0.00000001 BTC Lot 2: WINNER Satoshi Nakamoto  with 0.00000001 BTCLot 3: WINNER Satoshi Nakamoto  with 0.00000001 BTCMaterial : Framed, PosterSize : 45,9 x 60,9 cmWeight : 1,598 kgDenomination : -----Prototypes : #3 *(Final:EARTH Edition #3/3: "The Great Threefold Cord" https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5429036.new#new!)(New material images coming soon.)This artwork's material is still in development, as I strive to find the best fit for my earth element. *(The material will stay as it is, sometimes, you just need to move forward!)On my birthday, I've decided to auction the earth prototype as a test version, and I will handwrite "prototypes" on the front. Consider this a gift for the Bitcointalk community.BTC BTC Payment Adress: 3BQ8juk7VnsK4X9nwUgWXAM7KT5EPfoknBPayment Due: Within 48 hoursEscrow: Available at cost of buyerShipping: Paid for by seller. (from Central Europe) approx. 70$Video of my AR(Augmented Reality) Layer for physical artwork:--->>> https://streamable.com/nxrgar <<<---Story behind the artworkThe Great Threefold CordWithin every successful hero lies a deep secret. Great champions and heroes go the extra mile to find the key to the vault of these secrets. And like the Giant Polyphemus asks of Odysseus “What secrets?”.For our hero, one of the greatest keys to finding these secrets is in uniting with the keepers of these great mysteries of survival. Within a unique system lie some of the greatest secrets of the universe.There exists one particular secret which our hero is seeking: to shutdown the source of the enemies supplies and riches.The next ally to our hero is Earth, a good friend of our hero's recently found helper, Water. With Earth in the equation it creates the great threefold cord that will enable our hero to overcome.To the fear of the enemy, Earth can destroy and suspend every source of its survival. With Earth the ground can stop producing every resource sustaining the enemy's production. With Earth against the enemy, it is only but a matter of time before the evil system falls into chaos.Our hero is not only revived and fit to carry on with Water at his side, but has now found the great key that will shutdown the enemy’s source of strength and survival.———————Feel Free to visit Mx12.Levins Bitcoin Art Threadhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5362071.0

comments.author: Cyrus
comments.body: Unbelievable. I'm 10 blocks late... How did I miss this?Actually, how did everyone miss this?Also, Happy Birthday!
